active_learning.discussion_prompt: In groups of 3-4, debate the effectiveness of relying solely on client-side vs. server-side file type validation. Use examples of bypass techniques like double extensions (.jpg.php), MIME spoofing, or null byte injection. Consider real-world impacts such as remote code execution and reference OWASP guidelines. Each group presents one pro/con argument and a proposed hybrid solution.
